company: Sekolah Vokasi Universitas Gadjah Mada (SV UGM)
description: Conducted theoretical research comparing YOLOv8 and Re-Detr models for rock detection and classification, extending findings from the Shale Shaker Cuttings Estimations project.
detailedDescription: As a contract researcher from my lecturer, I authored a research paper comparing the effectiveness of YOLOv8 and Re-Detr models in detecting and classifying rock cuttings, building on insights from my internship project. The research focused on theoretical model performance, analyzing metrics such as precision, recall, and computational efficiency for Oil and Gas applications.

mainProjects.name: Comparative Analysis of YOLOv8 and Re-Detr for Rock Detection
mainProjects.description: Authored a research paper comparing YOLOv8 and Re-Detr models for rock detection and classification in shale shaker systems.
mainProjects.impact: Provided theoretical insights to guide model selection for future computer vision applications in drilling operations.

achievements: Authored a research paper comparing YOLOv8 and Re-Detr for rock detection
Analyzed model performance metrics, achieving insights into trade-offs between accuracy and computational efficiency
Contributed to theoretical advancements in computer vision for oil and gas
Presented research findings to stakeholders, influencing future project directions
Enhanced understanding of model optimization for real-world applications

description: Developed a desktop application using Python for real-time monitoring and analysis for Oil and Gas Company, integrated with existing enterprise systems using WITS-Level-0 format protocols for data transmission. Ensured compatibility across Windows 7 to 11, addressing diverse OS kernel requirements.
detailedDescription: As a Full Stack Machine Learning Engineer, I designed and implemented a desktop application for real-time data processing and visualization, seamlessly integrated with PT Parama Data Unit's existing infrastructure. My work focused on ensuring cross-platform compatibility across Windows 7 to 11, optimizing performance for different kernel versions, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver a robust solution.

mainProjects.name: Desktop Monitoring Application
mainProjects.description: Built a Python-based desktop application for real-time data monitoring, integrated with company systems for seamless data flow.
mainProjects.impact: Enabled real-time insights for operational teams, improving decision-making efficiency.

achievements: Developed a cross-platform desktop application compatible with Windows 7-11
Achieve seamless integration with existing enterprise systems with WITS-Level-0 data exchange format, reducing data latency
Optimized application performance across diverse OS kernels
Collaborated with stakeholders to align application features with business needs
Improved operational efficiency through real-time monitoring capabilities

description: Developed a computer vision system for shale shaker cuttings estimation in Oil and Gas Company, focusing on real-time rock detection and analysis to enhance drilling process efficiency.
detailedDescription: During my internship, I focused on building a computer vision system for the Shale Shaker Cuttings Estimations project, utilizing OpenCV and Python to detect and analyze rock cuttings in real-time from CCTV footage. The system provided actionable insights for drilling operations, improving efficiency and accuracy.

mainProjects.name: Shale Shaker Cuttings Estimations
mainProjects.description: Developed a computer vision system to detect and analyze rock cuttings on shale shakers in real-time using CCTV footage.
mainProjects.impact: Achieved 85% detection accuracy, enhancing drilling operation efficiency.

achievements: Built a real-time computer vision system with 85% detection accuracy
Integrated system with existing monitoring platforms, improving operational workflows
Developed visualizations for rock composition trends, aiding decision-making
Collaborated with operational teams to align system features with field requirements
Gained hands-on experience in applying computer vision in the oil and gas industry
